section.name: XML Report Example
section.p: The following is an example of an XML report:
section.source: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <validateReport> <configuration> <version>1.3.1</version> <date>2013-09-12T20:32:42Z</date> <coreSchemas>[PDS4_PDS_1000.xsd]</coreSchemas> <coreSchematrons>[PDS4_PDS_1000.sch]</coreSchematrons> <modelVersion>1000</modelVersion> </configuration> <parameters> <targets>[http://pds.nasa.gov/repository/pds4/examples/dph_examples_1000/dph_example_products/product_table_character_grouped/Product_Table_Character_Grouped.xml]</targets> <severityLevel>Warnings</severityLevel> <recurseDirectories>true</recurseDirectories> </parameters> <label target="http://pds.nasa.gov/repository/pds4/examples/dph_examples_1000/dph_example_products/product_table_character_grouped/Product_Table_Character_Grouped.xml" status="FAIL"> <message severity="ERROR" line="90" column="47"> <content>cvc-complex-type.2.4.c: The matching wildcard is strict, but no declaration can be found for element 'dph:spacecraft_clock_start_count'.</content> </message> <message severity="ERROR" line="91" column="46"> <content>cvc-complex-type.2.4.c: The matching wildcard is strict, but no declaration can be found for element 'dph:spacecraft_clock_stop_count'.</content> </message> <message severity="ERROR" line="121"> <content>Generated checksum '653ac7fc8cdeee51a875689bc47a771a' does not match supplied checksum 'd220dac0d1fe312f3f3b9c824f6ac294' in the product label \ for the following uri reference: \ http://pds.nasa.gov/repository/pds4/examples/dph_examples_1000/dph_example_products/product_table_character_grouped/fs004sdd_001_4e0111040000a0.tab \ </content> </message> </label> </validateReport>
